*Big breath*

For cryin' out loud people!!! If you wanna argue, argue in private mail!! I came home to have heaps of mails.. most of which were from this silly arguement that doesn't involve the NBW RPG as a whole anyway!!! Cut it off!

Phew.. thankyou...

- Teltoli

------Original Message------
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 16, 2000 11:00:06 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Saga


still no excuse for what, KSLawDogg?......for my characters trying to work
stuff out with each other? for Yanshosh saying that my chaarcters would have
been destroyed even though only i can control MY characters? and yet i had
to apoligize, boy oh boy!....Yanshosh, (i call you that because you always
call me code!) understand that nobody would have permitted me to do that, so
i did it on my own.....because i didn't think it was fair for other people
to stop my important storylines, which is what would have
happened.......next time i'll do it slowly, but i'm not going to let
someeone like Liono stop my storylines.....my characters will eventually do
it anyway, except there will be other's involved futily trying to stop
them.........capishe?......OKAY!.......
